titleStmt.title: The Somersetshire wonder, or. Late dreadful judgments which hath hapened upon the family of Mr. Pope, of Wotton, near Glastenbury in the said country. To the tune of, The bleeding heart.

notesStmt.note: Place and date of publication from Wing.
Verse - "Good people all that round about me stand,".
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
